pages.title: African Softshell Turtle
pages.text: Despite the name "African softshell turtle", it is not the only species or genus of softshell turtle in Africa ($(o)the genera Cyclanorbis and Cycloderma are also African).$(br2)They are omnivores in diet, consuming small fish, crustaceans, and also palm seeds and fallen leaves.

pages.title: African Softshell Turtle
pages.text: Relative Size: ★★★☆☆$(br2)Always active$(br2)1 Colors$(br2)Favourite Food: minecraft:cod$(br2)Number of Offspring: 5$(br2)Growth time: 6 Days
